name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.description: Introduction to the study of airflow and forces.

lessons.name: Bernoulli's Principle
lessons.description: Understanding lift generation and pressure differences.

lessons.name: Viscosity and Drag
lessons.description: Exploring drag forces and fluid friction.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Mach Number
lessons.description: Definition and importance of Mach number.

lessons.name: Shock Waves
lessons.description: Formation and behavior of shock waves in supersonic flow.

lessons.name: Compressible Flow
lessons.description: Fluid behavior at high velocities.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Conduction, convection, and radiation in aerodynamic contexts.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Materials and design of spacecraft heat shields.

lessons.name: Re-entry Heating
lessons.description: Thermal challenges during atmospheric re-entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Loads in Space
lessons.description: Understanding loads experienced by spacecraft.

lessons.name: Material Selection
lessons.description: Choosing materials for strength, weight, and durability.

lessons.name: Vibration and Stress Analysis
lessons.description: Testing spacecraft resilience under dynamic conditions.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws
lessons.description: Orbital motion fundamentals.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers
lessons.description: Hohmann transfers and delta-v calculations.

lessons.name: Mission Design
lessons.description: Planning trajectories and mission parameters.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Subsystem Overview
lessons.description: Power, thermal, and communications subsystems.

lessons.name: Systems Integration
lessons.description: Combining subsystems into a functioning spacecraft.

lessons.name: Testing and Validation
lessons.description: Ensuring spacecraft readiness for launch.

name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
description: Study of structure, bonding, and basic reactions of organic molecules.

lessons.description: Introduction to carbon bonding and hybridization.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Overview of functional groups in organic compounds.

lessons.name: Isomerism
lessons.description: Understanding structural and stereoisomers.

description: Exploring the mechanisms behind organic chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Nucleophilic Substitution
lessons.description: SN1 and SN2 reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: E1 and E2 reaction pathways.

lessons.name: Radical Reactions
lessons.description: Understanding free radical mechanisms.

name: Organic Synthesis
description: Strategies for designing and synthesizing organic molecules.

lessons.name: Synthesis Planning
lessons.description: Retrosynthetic analysis and synthetic design.

lessons.name: Reagents and Conditions
lessons.description: Common reagents and their reactivity.

lessons.name: Multistep Synthesis
lessons.description: Combining reactions for complex molecule synthesis.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Study of elements, coordination compounds, and periodic trends.

lessons.name: Periodic Table Trends
lessons.description: Understanding trends in the periodic table.

lessons.name: Bonding in Inorganics
lessons.description: Covalent, ionic, and metallic bonding.

lessons.name: Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Introduction to coordination chemistry.

description: Chemistry of transition metals and their compounds.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Explaining color and magnetism in complexes.

lessons.name: Ligand Field Stabilization
lessons.description: Energetics of metal-ligand interactions.

lessons.name: Organometallic Chemistry
lessons.description: Bonding between metals and organic ligands.

name: Industrial Inorganic Chemistry
description: Applications of inorganic chemistry in industry and technology.

lessons.name: Catalysis in Industry
lessons.description: Role of catalysts in chemical production.

lessons.name: Materials Chemistry
lessons.description: Ceramics, glasses, and metals.

lessons.name: Environmental Impact
lessons.description: Green chemistry and sustainability.

description: Study of heat, work, and energy in chemical systems.

lessons.description: The three laws governing energy transformations.

lessons.name: Enthalpy and Entropy
lessons.description: Energy and disorder in reactions.

lessons.name: Gibbs Free Energy

description: Understanding the rates and mechanisms of chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Reaction Rates
lessons.description: Measuring and interpreting reaction rates.

lessons.name: Rate Laws
lessons.description: Deriving rate laws from experimental data.

lessons.name: Catalysis
lessons.description: How catalysts affect reaction rates.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Introduction to quantum mechanical principles in chemistry.

lessons.name: Wave-Particle Duality
lessons.description: Fundamentals of quantum theory.

lessons.name: Atomic Orbitals
lessons.description: Shapes and energy levels of orbitals.

lessons.name: Molecular Orbitals
lessons.description: Bonding from a quantum perspective.

name: Ancient Scripts and Alphabets
description: Study of Elvish, Dwarvish, and other ancient Middle-earth scripts.

lessons.description: Introduction to Elvish and Dwarvish writing systems.

lessons.description: Techniques for translating runic inscriptions.

lessons.description: Practicing written forms of Elvish languages.

description: Tracing how languages changed over the Ages.

lessons.name: Language Families
lessons.description: Elvish, Mannish, and Dwarvish linguistic roots.

lessons.name: Language Contact
lessons.description: Influences between races and cultures.

lessons.name: Preservation of Lore
lessons.description: The role of writing in preserving history.

name: Translation and Interpretation
description: Studying how meaning is preserved or altered through translation.

lessons.name: Elvish Poetry
lessons.description: Translating Elvish verse with accuracy and beauty.

lessons.name: Bilingual Inscriptions
lessons.description: Analyzing texts written in multiple languages.

lessons.name: Modern Adaptations
lessons.description: Influence of ancient scripts on modern languages.

description: Analysis of major inter-racial councils and alliances throughout the history of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The Last Alliance
lessons.description: Elves and Men uniting against Sauron.

lessons.description: Diplomatic unity in the Third Age.

description: Study of political influence and rhetorical strategies used by Elves, Men, and Wizards.

lessons.description: Power and persuasion among the Istari.

lessons.description: The role of Elrond in mediating alliances.

description: Exploration of wars, treaties, and the forging of peace among Middle-earth's civilizations.

lessons.description: Civil discord among Men and its consequences.

lessons.name: Elves and Dwarves
lessons.description: Historic tensions and moments of alliance.

lessons.name: The Reunification of the Kingdoms
lessons.description: Rebuilding unity in the Fourth Age.
